recipe.title: Banana Coconut Ice Cream
ingredients: 1/2 cup well-stirred canned cream of coconut such as Coco Lopez
instructions: Cut bananas into 1/2-inch-thick slices and arrange in one layer in a shallow baking pan. Freeze bananas 15 minutes, or until firm. In a blender or food processor purée bananas with remaining ingredients until smooth. Freeze mixture in an ice-cream maker.
